# init(device:)

**Initializer**

Initializes a sigmoid neuron filter.

## Declaration

```swift
init(device: any MTLDevice)
```

## Parameters

- **device**: The device the filter will run on.

## Return Value

A valid [doc://com.apple.metalperformanceshaders/documentation/MetalPerformanceShaders/MPSCNNNeuronSigmoid] object or `nil`, if failure.
